How to Add a YouTube Video

This guide will help you add YouTube videos to your OptiSigns displays.

Step 1: Get the YouTube URL

First, copy the YouTube video URL from your browser.

The URL should look like: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VIDEO_ID

Step 2: Add to OptiSigns

Go to your OptiSigns dashboard and click on "Add Content".

Select "YouTube Video" from the content types.

Paste the URL and click "Add".

Troubleshooting

If the video doesn't load, check that:

  • The URL is correct
  • The video is publicly available
  • Your display has internet connectivity
